alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:46AM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 17 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central and eastern Lake County including Leadville and the La Garita mountains above 10000 feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief lull in the snow will be possible Tuesday afternoon before snow increases again Tuesday night through Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
